name: Mahjong Cub3D
overview: With 200 Mahjong matching puzzles, delivered in full, vibrant 3D through the power of Nintendo 3DS, MAHJONG CUB3D offers colorful, meditative, challenging puzzle gameplay that's easy to pick up and impossible to set down! Three amazing game modes, including the 2-player Versus, add value to an overall package that fires out from every angle.
